member.name: T:OpenNLP.Tools.Coreference.Resolver.INonReferentialResolver
member.summary: Provides the interface for a object to provide a resolver with a non-referential probability. Non-referential resolvers compute the probability that a particular mention refers to no antecedent. This probability can then compete with the probability that a mention refers with a specific antecedent.

The default DataReader to use with this class is PlainTextByLineDataReader, but you can provide other types of ITrainingDataReaders if you wish to receive data from sources other than plain text files; however, be sure that each token your ITrainingDataReader returns is a valid sentence.

member.summary:
Allows subclasses to check an overzealous (read: poorly trained) model from flagging obvious non-breaks as breaks based on some boolean determination of a break's acceptability.
The implementation here always returns true, which means that the IMaximumEntropyModel's outcome is taken as is.

the start of the segment currently being evaluated
the index of the candidate sentence ending
member.returns: true if the break is acceptable
